mapper.select:
SELECT
od.id, od.vip_id, od.periods, od.buy_amount, od.support_win,od.selected_size,od.video_serial, od.final_result, od.add_time,od.remark
FROM `bjl_order` od INNER JOIN `bjl_draw_records` re ON
od.`periods`=re.`award_period` AND od.final_result = 0 AND re.draw_result != 0;

SELECT IFNULL( sum( t.buy_amount ), 0 ) AS betAmount, IFNULL( sum( IF ( t.selected_size = 1, t.buy_amount, 0 ) ), 0 ) AS betAmount1, IFNULL( sum( IF ( t.selected_size = 2, t.buy_amount, 0 ) ), 0 ) AS betAmount2, IFNULL( sum( IF ( t.selected_size = 3, t.buy_amount, 0 ) ), 0 ) AS betAmount3, IFNULL( sum( IF ( t.selected_size = 4, t.buy_amount, 0 ) ), 0 ) AS betAmount4, IFNULL( sum( IF ( t.selected_size = 5, t.buy_amount, 0 ) ), 0 ) AS betAmount5 FROM bjl_order t WHERE t.periods = #{periods} GROUP BY t.periods
